content.rendered:
Directed by Mudassar Aziz

Written by Mudassar Aziz

Cast Sonakshi Sinha (Harpreet ‘Happy’ Kaur). Diana Penty (Harpreet ‘Happy’ Kaur). Jimmy Shergill (Daman Singh Bagga (as Jimmy Sheirgill)). Ali Fazal (Guddu). Piyush Mishra (Usman Afridi). Jassie Gill (Khushwant Singh Gill (as Jassi Gill)). Denzil Smith (Adnan Chow). Jason Tham (Chang). Bijou Thaangjam (Chinese Agent). Jeeveshu Ahluwalia (Fa Qu / Fakharuddin Qureshi). Gaurav Dixit (Dimpy). Ashu Sharma (Winkle / Guddu’s Brother) . Sahil Dua (Karan). Sarah Hashmi (Gurleen). Aslam Hussain (Tailor). Aparshakti Khurana (Amar Singh Wadhwa). Parvez Patwary Milon (Roni)

Language Hindi

Producers Akash Singh Bhadauriya. Manish Bhogte. Sahni Bob. Nitin Dalvi. Sumit Grover. Mrunalini Havaldar. Aslam Hussain. Mohammad S. Hyderabadwala. Kanupriya. Hemal Kothari. Hemendra Kulkarni. Krishika Lulla. Sandeep Nair. Azeem Qamar. Aanand L. Rai. Rajesh Shah. Himanshu Sharma

Production Colour Yellow Production. Eros Worldwide
